pageContext.claim: “By the way, they duped her yesterday. She was on an interview, and she said, 'We've been working on this for two and a half years.' So she's -- she was working on it, in other words, two years before we ever spoke to Ukraine. She said, 'We've been working on impeachment for two and a half years.'”
pageContext.analysis: Pelosi did not say that the impeachment probe had been going on for two and half years. Rather she was responding to criticism of the Democrats expedience in the inquiry. She immediately made clear she was talking about the Mueller investigation, saying, “I think we are not moving with speed. Was it two and a half years ago they initiated the Mueller investigation? It’s not about speed. It’s about urgency. One of the charges against the president of the United States is that he was violating his oath of office by asking for government to interfere in our election undermining the integrity of our elections,” she said.
